list.title: Discord Access
list.description: Get access to Crypto Cobains exclusive Discord Channel. You will gain access to secret channels and receive a special Discord role.

list.title: Exclusive Livestream
list.description: Get access to Crypto Cobains exclusive Livestream!

list.title: Get a Shoutout
list.description: Get a 30 second custom video from Crypto Cobain. Surprise your friends or treat yourself!
